body:
Hi Everybody,



I tried to use "Honeybee_EnergyPlus Window Shade Generator" to created a shade for a windows, I set "interiorOrExter_" to "True", but the shade is displayed on outside of room.



An other question, how to check/display the normal direction of the surface?



May I get some help from someone, how to move the shade to inside room.



Thanks advance.



Solon.

replies.body:
Hi,

please find attached.

best,

Omid

Hi Omid Rashidi,



Thank you very much, the problem was solved according to your solution.



Solon.

Hi Omid Rashidi,



I checked your solution again, It seem there is an other problem, if the setting of "ShadeType_" of "Honeybee_EnergyPlus Window Shade Generator" is "1", the display is correct, but if the setting of "ShadeType_" is "0",  and change the direction of  window and single wall(bypass the "Flip" component), the position of shade can not be changed accordingly. it seems it is a bug.



Solon
